data.title: Scenic West Athletic Conference
data.meta_description: The Scenic West Athletic Conference is a National Junior College Athletic Association (NJCAA) Division I baseball conference with a membership base in the Mountain States region consisting of schools in Colorado, Idaho, Nevada and Utah. Since the SWAC is the only conference in NJCAA Region 18 to...
data.text:
The Scenic West Athletic Conference is a National Junior College Athletic Association (NJCAA) Division I baseball conference with a membership base in the Mountain States region consisting of schools in Colorado, Idaho, Nevada and Utah. Since the SWAC is the only conference in NJCAA Region 18 to sponsor baseball, the SWAC Conference Tournament doubles as the Region 18 Tournament with the winner advancing to the Western District Championships. The SWAC has produced two NJCAA Junior College World Series champions: Southern Nevada in 2003 and Dixie State in 2004.

Member schools[]

Colorado Northwestern Spartans

Eastern Utah Golden Eagles

Salt Lake Bruins

Southern Idaho Golden Eagles

Southern Nevada Coyotes

Former members[]

Dixie State Rebels - moved to NCAA Division II

Utah Valley State Wolverines - moved to NCAA Division I
